lyrics.lyric: Woke up on the right side of the bed
What's up with this Prince song inside my head?
lyrics.tlyric: 不知怎么的 脑中突然回想起王子的歌曲

lyrics.lyric: Hands up if you're down to get down tonight
lyrics.tlyric: 如果你也打算来狂欢那就举起手来欢呼吧

lyrics.lyric: Cause it's always a good time.
lyrics.tlyric: 因为每一刻都是美好时光

lyrics.lyric: Slept in all my clothes like I didn't care
lyrics.tlyric: 是否伴衣入睡我毫不在乎

lyrics.lyric: Hopped into a cab, take me anywhere
lyrics.tlyric: 跳进出租车 带我去任何好玩的地方

lyrics.lyric: I'm in if you're down to get down tonight
lyrics.tlyric: 如果今夜你打算狂欢的话我也加入

lyrics.lyric: Cuz it's always a good time
lyrics.tlyric: 因为每一刻都是美好时光

lyrics.lyric: We don't even have to try
We don't even have to try, it's always a good time.
lyrics.tlyric: 我们甚至无需刻意追求 每一刻都是美好时光

lyrics.lyric: Freaked out dropped my phone in the pool again
lyrics.tlyric: 一不留神又把手机掉进了泳池里

lyrics.lyric: Checked out of my room hit the ATM
Let's hang out if you're down to get down tonight
lyrics.tlyric: 让我们今夜一起出去狂欢吧

lyrics.lyric: Cuz it's always a good time
lyrics.tlyric: 因为每一刻都是美好时光

lyrics.lyric: It's gonna be alright we don't even have to try
lyrics.tlyric: 一切都会好起来的 我们都不必在意

lyrics.lyric: We don't even have to try, it's always a good time.
lyrics.tlyric: 我们甚至无需刻意追求 每一刻都是美好时光

lyrics.lyric: We don't even have to try, it's always a good time.
lyrics.tlyric: 我们甚至无需刻意追求 每一刻都是美好时光

lyrics.lyric: It's always a good time then
lyrics.tlyric: 那一刻总会是美好时光

lyrics.lyric: It's always a good time there
lyrics.tlyric: 那里每一刻都是美好时光

[00:06.120]共度美好时光

[00:09.769]共度美好时光吧

[00:19.660]不知怎么的  脑中突然回想起王子的歌曲
[00:23.480]今夜我们来借舞消愁
[00:28.660]因为我们共度美好时光
